nodes.text: Unit 07 was a BX-series droid commando who participated in the Battle of the Rishi moon.

After Commander Cody and Captain Rex were presumed "pulverized," he and two other droid commandos, Units 08 and 09 guarded the entrance to the station. He was surprised to see Unit 26 still alive, only to find out too late that, instead of Unit 26, it was Cody and Rex, who were still alive.
The droid opened the blast doors and was blasted by Rex, leading the clone troopers right into the base.
